name: MetaMorphic Rippers
description:
Important a Phone is Not Required to play this game


Developed by SlovGoblin, MetaMorphic Rippers is a fast-paced arena Brawler that combines the Stylish Combat of a Hack and Slash Game With Transformations, Players can select each Class with unique attributes and abilities for you to master.

Key Features

Fast-paced Arena Combat
skill-based competition, and intense battles
Incredible, Diverse RipperSuits
4 unique Classes each equipped with unique attributes and abilities to fit your play style
Pick-ups are scattered across the map to help you in the Heat Of Battle.
